item.description:
Tom and Chago's Excellent Adventure Weekend is not your typical mountain sport weekend. No crazy long hikes or white water kayaking.  Instead we do the more accessible but tourist-friendly activities.  Be prepared to slide down water slides, play frisbee golf, zip line, fly down mountain coasters and act like a big kid.  

Accommodations for Friday and Saturday night are at the Wedeln Ski club, only $20 a night.  The Wedeln Ski & Outdoors House has 19 bedrooms, with 78 beds, located 5 minutes from Cranmore and 20 min from Attitash.  

We will host a bonefire and BBQ on Saturday night with steak, chicken, grilled portabello mushrooms and many sides - dinner is $15.

SATURDAY - ATTITASH DAY

I think most of us will go for the full day ticket for $45

A full day ticket includes unlimited use of the following: Alpine Slides, Waterslides, Mountain Biking, EuroBungy Trampoline, Climbing Wall, Scenic Chair Ride, Mountain Coaster

For a-la-cart pricing check out:

http://www.attitash.com/ticketprices.html

 

SUNDAY  - CRANMORE DAY

Cranmore Mountain Adventure is brand new with many activities.  A 3 hour Aerial Adventure course complete with zip lines and rope bridges.  An all access pass is $65 but check out the individual descriptions and pricing to determine your proper fun level.  I definitely want to check out the frisbee golf course.

http://www.cranmore.com/summer

The adventure park payments are all up to you, I will only collect $ for accomadations and the BBQ.  

OTHER OPTIONS - This same week several members of our club will host a motorcycle touring weekend.  We will share some activities such as BBQ and bonfire but will ride to our separate adventures during the day, let me know if you prefer to hang with the bikers.  Also there are great hiking and mountain biking trails that run right out behind our house (we are located next to national forest land).  I know some people may hike on Sunday instead of paying the $ to go go to Cranmore.  Also I may come up early friday morning and do a moderate day hike if anyone can take the day off and join me.

The Wedeln Ski & Outdoor Club is a friendly, fun and very welcoming group of people.  Most of our events have many first time guests so come on up!  Our club is a not-for-profit so all $ go back into the house for upkeep and general expenses.  The house is 21+ only, no pets, no smoking in house.
item.how_to_find_us: Come up Friday night, I will be inside at the house bar.
item.name: Excellent Adventure Weekend!
